title: Finding Community, and Freedom, on VRChat
description: On any given weekend, there are dozens of parties happening on VRChat, a platform where users assume fantastical avatars of their own design.

title: Is A.I. the Future of Test Prep?
description: Riiid is one of a handful of companies that believe that A.I.’s algorithms are perfectly suited to track student performance and give individualized attention.

title: For Sale on eBay: A Military Database of Fingerprints and Iris Scans
description: German security researchers studying biometric capture devices popular with the U.S. military got more than they expected for $68 on eBay.
